trans-unit.source: Provides navigation and a user interface (UI) to collect related data across multiple steps.
trans-unit.target: 提供导航和用户界面 (UI) 以跨多个步骤收集相关的数据。

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#introduction) - [Wizard Components](#components) - [Wizard Steps](#wizard_steps) - [Collecting Wizard Data](#collecting_wizard_data) - [Wizard Command Names](#wizard_command_names) - [Dynamically Changing Steps](#dynamically_changing_steps) - [Wizard Appearance](#wizard_appearance) - [Formatting Using Layout Templates](#formatting_using_layout_templates) - [Accessibility](#accessibility) - [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## Introduction You can use the Wizard control to: - Collect related data across multiple steps.
trans-unit.target: 本主题中:-[简介](#introduction) - [向导组件](#components) - [向导步骤](#wizard_steps) - [收集向导数据](#collecting_wizard_data) - [向导命令名称](#wizard_command_names) - [动态更改步骤](#dynamically_changing_steps) - [向导外观](#wizard_appearance) - [格式使用的布局模板](#formatting_using_layout_templates) - [可访问性](#accessibility) - [声明性语法](#declarative_syntax) # # 介绍你可以使用该向导控件:-跨多个步骤收集相关的数据。

trans-unit.source: - Break up a larger Web page used to collect user input into smaller logical steps.
trans-unit.target: -分解较大的网页用于收集用户输入到较小的逻辑步骤。

trans-unit.source: - Allow for either linear or nonlinear navigation through the steps.
trans-unit.target: -可以完成的步骤的线性或非线性导航。

trans-unit.source: ## Wizard Components The Wizard control is made up of the following components: - A collection of steps that contain the user interface for each step, as defined by the page developer.
trans-unit.target: # # 向导组件向导控件组成的以下组件:-页面开发人员定义包含每个步骤的用户界面的步骤的集合。

trans-unit.source: - Built-in navigation capabilities that determine the appropriate buttons to display based on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.StepType%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: -内置导航功能，用于确定相应的按钮以显示基于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.StepType%2A>值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.StepType%2A>

trans-unit.source: - A header area that can be customized to display information specific to the step that the user is currently on.
trans-unit.target: -A 标题区域，可以对其进行自定义，以向用户目前的步骤中显示特定信息。

trans-unit.source: - A sidebar area that can be used to quickly navigate to steps in the control.
trans-unit.target: -A 侧栏区域，可用于快速导航到控件中的步骤。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you are using Microsoft Visual Studio 2005, note that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> is persisted in Source view.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 如果使用 Microsoft Visual Studio 2005，请注意，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>保留在源视图。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you change the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A> property in Design view by clicking the sidebar buttons, and you then run the page, the first step of the `Wizard` control might not be shown because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> might be pointing to a different step.
trans-unit.target: 如果你更改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A>属性在设计视图中通过单击侧栏按钮，然后运行此页面的第一步`Wizard`控件可能不会显示，因为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>可能指向了另一个步骤。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Wizard Steps Each of the steps in the Wizard control has a property that determines the kind of navigation functionality that the step has.
trans-unit.target: # # 向导步骤，每个向导控件中的步骤都有属性，用于确定具有的导航功能的类型。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.StepType%2A> property, the default value is <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果不指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.StepType%2A>属性，则默认值为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.StepType%2A>的值

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.StepType%2A> property and the resulting behavior of the step.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出的可用设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.StepType%2A>属性和步骤所产生行为。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.StepType%2A>

trans-unit.source: `WizardStepType.Auto` The navigation UI that is rendered for the step is determined by the order in which the step is declared.
trans-unit.target: `WizardStepType.Auto`由在其中声明该步骤的顺序确定的导航步骤呈现的用户界面。

trans-unit.source: `WizardStepType.Complete` The step is the last one to appear.
trans-unit.target: `WizardStepType.Complete`要显示的最后一个步骤。

trans-unit.source: No navigation buttons are rendered.
trans-unit.target: 没有导航按钮的呈现。

trans-unit.source: `WizardStepType.Finish` The step is the last one that collects user data.
trans-unit.target: `WizardStepType.Finish`步是收集用户数据的最后一个。

trans-unit.source: The **Finish** button is rendered for navigation.
trans-unit.target: **完成**呈现用于导航的按钮。

trans-unit.source: `WizardStepType.Start` The step is the first one to appear.
trans-unit.target: `WizardStepType.Start`步骤是第一个显示。

trans-unit.source: A **Previous** button is not rendered.
trans-unit.target: A**上一步**不呈现按钮。

trans-unit.source: `WizardStepType.Step` The step is any step between the first and last.
trans-unit.target: `WizardStepType.Step`该步骤是任何步骤之间第一个和最后一个。

trans-unit.source: **Previous** and **Next** buttons are rendered for navigation.
trans-unit.target: **以前**和**下一步**呈现用于导航的按钮。

trans-unit.source: ## Collecting Wizard Data Using the Wizard control, data can be collected through linear or nonlinear navigation.
trans-unit.target: # # 使用向导控件收集向导数据，可以通过线性或非线性导航收集数据。

trans-unit.source: Some examples of nonlinear navigation are skipping unnecessary steps or returning to a previously completed step to change some value.
trans-unit.target: 正在跳过不必要的步骤或返回到以前完成的步骤，若要更改某个值非线性导航的一些示例。

trans-unit.source: The Wizard control maintains its state between steps, so the data entered on a step does not need to be persisted to a data store until all the steps of the Wizard control have been completed.
trans-unit.target: 向导控件保持其状态之间的步骤，因此不需要要持久化到数据存储区中，直到已完成的向导控件的所有步骤输入在步骤中的数据。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you want to persist the collected data to a data store as each step is completed, such as when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NextButtonClick> event is raised, you should set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.AllowReturn%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> object to `false` so that the user cannot return to a previously completed step and change the data once it has been submitted.
trans-unit.target: 或者，如果你想要收集将数据保存到数据存储为每个步骤完成，例如，当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NextButtonClick>引发事件，应将<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.AllowReturn%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>对象传递给`false`，以便用户无法返回到以前完成的步骤，并且一旦已提交更改的数据。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.AllowReturn%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NextButtonClick>

trans-unit.source: ## Wizard Command Names The Wizard control inherits the following command names from the class and class: , , , and .
trans-unit.target: # # 向导命令名称，则向导控件将继承从下面的命令名类和类︰ ， ， ，和。

trans-unit.source: The Wizard control ignores these command names and does not include any special logic to enable these commands to automatically work for navigation.
trans-unit.target: 向导控件将忽略这些命令名称，并且不包含任何特殊逻辑，用于启用这些命令，使其自动适用于导航。

trans-unit.source: If a command name is removed or is missing from a button in the Wizard control, no exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果命令名称被删除，或缺少向导控件中的按钮，不引发异常。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A> button is missing a value for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>, no exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A>按钮缺少的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>，不会引发异常。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dynamically Changing Steps You can use the method or the property to dynamically change the step that is currently displayed in the Wizard control.
trans-unit.target: # # 动态更改步骤可以使用方法或属性可以动态更改当前向导在控件中显示的步骤。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you programmatically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep> in the `Page_Load` event handler, you must add the navigation to that step prior to the page loading.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果以编程方式添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep>中`Page_Load`事件处理程序，必须将在导航窗格添加到之前页面加载该步骤。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep>

trans-unit.source: ## Wizard Appearance The appearance of the Wizard control is fully customizable through templates, skins, and style settings.
trans-unit.target: # # 向导外观向导控件的外观会通过模板、 外观和样式设置完全可自定义。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderTemplate%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarTemplate%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishNavigationTemplate%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNavigationTemplate%2A> properties to customize the interface of the Wizard control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderTemplate%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarTemplate%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishNavigationTemplate%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNavigationTemplate%2A>自定义界面的向导控件的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNavigationTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishNavigationTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishNavigationTemplate%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.DisplaySideBar%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderTemplate%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarTemplate%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNavigationTemplate%2A> property recreates the child controls of the Wizard control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishNavigationTemplate%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.DisplaySideBar%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderTemplate%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarTemplate%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNavigationTemplate%2A>属性重新创建向导控件的子控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StepNavigationTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.StartNavigationTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.SideBarTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.DisplaySideBar%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishNavigationTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: As a result, the view state for the child controls is lost in the process.
trans-unit.target: 因此，在过程中丢失的子控件的视图状态。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this situation, explicitly maintain the control state of the Wizard control's child controls explicitly, or avoid putting controls inside of templates.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免这种情况下，显式显式，维护向导控件的子控件的控件状态，或避免使模板内部的控件。

trans-unit.source: Note that the Wizard control does not support special Microsoft Internet Explorer rendering for non-standard or quirks mode.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，向导控件不支持特殊的 Microsoft Internet Explorer 呈现为非标准或 quirks 模式。

trans-unit.source: To get the best Internet Explorer rendering using the Wizard control, use the XHTML doc type, which is added by default in Visual Web Developer and Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取使用向导控件的最佳 Internet 资源管理器中呈现，请使用 XHTML 文档类型，默认情况下，在 Visual Web Developer 和 Visual Studio 中添加。

trans-unit.source: ## Formatting Using Layout Templates The Wizard control lets you specify the layout of the control without requiring you to use an HTML `table` element.
trans-unit.target: # # 格式使用布局模板向导控件允许你指定的控件布局，而无需使用 HTML`table`元素。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you can use a `LayoutTemplate` element to specify the layout.
trans-unit.target: 相反，你可以使用`LayoutTemplate`元素以指定的布局。

trans-unit.source: In the template, you create placeholder controls to indicate where items should be dynamically inserted into the control.
trans-unit.target: 在模板中，你创建占位符控件以指示应在控件中动态插入项的位置。

trans-unit.source: (This is similar to how the template model for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control works.) For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.LayoutTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: (这是类似于如何模板模型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件的工作原理。)</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.LayoutTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.LayoutTemplate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: ## Accessibility For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: # # 有关如何配置此控件，以使其生成符合辅助功能标准的标记辅助功能的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Use the Wizard constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用向导构造函数来创建和初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>的新实例

trans-unit.source: Gets the step in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps*> collection that is currently displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取该步骤中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps*>当前向用户显示的集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps*>

trans-unit.source: The ActiveStep property returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> object that is currently displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: ActiveStep 属性返回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>中当前显示的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: The ActiveStep property is read-only; however, you can use the ActiveStep property to access the properties of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> object.
trans-unit.target: ActiveStep 属性是只读的;但是，你可以使用 ActiveStep 属性来访问当前的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> property to dynamically change the ActiveStep to a different <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>属性可以动态更改为另一种的 ActiveStep<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.MoveTo%2A> method to dynamically set the ActiveStep property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.MoveTo%2A>方法动态设置 ActiveStep 属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.MoveTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref> that is currently displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"> </xref>当前显示给用户。

trans-unit.source: The corresponding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex*> is less than -1 or greater than the number of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 相应<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex*>小于-1 或大于数<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>中的对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user switches to a new step in the control.
trans-unit.target: 当用户切换到控件中的新步骤时发生。

trans-unit.source: The ActiveStepChanged event is raised when the current step that is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control changes.
trans-unit.target: 当前步骤时引发 ActiveStepChanged 事件显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制更改。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: Use the ActiveStepChanged event to provide additional processing when the current step of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control changes.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ActiveStepChanged 事件来提供其他处理时的当前步骤<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控制更改。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当前的索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The ActiveStepIndex property provides the zero-based index of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> object that is currently displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: ActiveStepIndex 属性提供的从零开始的索引<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>中当前显示的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: You can programmatically set the ActiveStepIndex property to control which step is displayed to the user at run time.
trans-unit.target: 控制哪个步骤向用户显示在运行时，可以编程方式设置 ActiveStepIndex 属性。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you are using Microsoft Visual Studio 2005, note that the ActiveStepIndex is persisted in Source view.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 如果使用 Microsoft Visual Studio 2005，请注意 ActiveStepIndex 保持不变在源视图中。

trans-unit.source: If you change the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A> property in Design view by clicking the sidebar buttons, and you then run the page, the first step of the `Wizard` control might not be shown because the ActiveStepIndex might be pointing to a different step.
trans-unit.target: 如果你更改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A>属性在设计视图中通过单击侧栏按钮，然后运行此页面的第一步`Wizard`控件可能不会显示，因为 ActiveStepIndex 可能指向了另一个步骤。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.WizardSteps%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the value of ActiveStepIndex to -1 to support a wizard with no steps by default, the following behavior occurs: - If you declaratively set ActiveStepIndex to -1 or set it to -1 as a default value, the control will always try to render the first step in the wizard.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 ActiveStepIndex 的值设置为-1 以支持默认情况下不需要执行步骤向导时，会出现以下行为:-如果你以声明方式将 ActiveStepIndex 设置为-1 或设置它为-1 作为默认值，该控件将始终尝试将呈现向导的第一步。

trans-unit.source: - If you programmatically set ActiveStepIndex to -1, the control will not render.

trans-unit.source: The AllowNavigationToStep method will return `false` if the index that is passed in refers to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> object that has already been accessed and has its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase.AllowReturn%2A> property set to `false`; otherwise, it will return `true`.

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space between the contents of the cell and the cell border.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置单元格的内容和单元格边框之间的空间量。

trans-unit.source: Use the CellPadding property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell border.
trans-unit.target: CellPadding 属性用于控制单元格的内容和单元格边框之间的间距。

trans-unit.source: The padding amount that is specified is added to all four sides of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 指定的填充量添加到单元格的所有四个边。

trans-unit.source: All cells in a column share the same cell width; therefore, the spacing is applied to the widest cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: 列中的所有单元格都具有相同的单元格宽度;因此，距离将应用于列中最宽的单元格。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, all cells in the same row share the same cell height.
trans-unit.target: 同样，在同一行中的所有单元格共享相同的单元格高度。

trans-unit.source: Thus, the spacing is applied to the tallest cell in the row.
trans-unit.target: 因此，距离将应用于行中最高的单元格。

trans-unit.source: Individual cell sizes cannot be specified.
trans-unit.target: 不能指定单个单元格的大小。

trans-unit.source: The amount of space, in pixels, between the contents of a cell and the cell border.
trans-unit.target: 以像素为单位的单元格的内容和单元格边框之间的空间量。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space between cells.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置单元格之间的空间量。

trans-unit.source: Use the CellSpacing property to control the spacing between adjacent cells in a Wizard control.
trans-unit.target: CellSpacing 属性用于控制的向导控件中的相邻单元格之间的间距。

trans-unit.source: This spacing is applied both vertically and horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 在垂直方向和水平应用此间距。

trans-unit.source: The amount of space, in pixels, between cells.
trans-unit.target: 以像素为单位的单元格之间的空间量。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: When this value is `false`, cell spacing is applied.

trans-unit.source: The FinishCompleteButtonStyle property defines the appearance for the **Finish** button on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: FinishCompleteButtonStyle 属性定义的外观**完成**按钮上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: The FinishCompleteButtonStyle property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: FinishCompleteButtonStyle 属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>它将返回的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>类 (例如， `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式设置属性的形式`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常用的设置包括自定义的背景色、 文本颜色和字体属性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the FinishCompleteButtonStyle property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 与的样式设置合并 FinishCompleteButtonStyle 属性的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any setting that is applied in the FinishCompleteButtonStyle property overrides the corresponding setting in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: FinishCompleteButtonStyle 属性中应用任何设置将重写中的相应设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishCompleteButtonType%2A> property, the FinishCompleteButtonText property can appear as text on a button, as text displayed as an alternative to an image in browsers that do not render images, or as the text of a link.

trans-unit.source: Use the FinishNavigationTemplate property to specify the custom content that is displayed for the navigation area on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType> step of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 FinishNavigationTemplate 属性指定的导航区域显示的自定义内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType>的步骤<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType>

trans-unit.target: 通过创建指定的导航区域上的呈现方式的模板定义的内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType>步骤。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType>

trans-unit.source: The custom content for the template is contained within the FinishNavigationTemplate object.
trans-unit.target: 模板的自定义内容包含在 FinishNavigationTemplate 对象。

trans-unit.source: You can add custom content to the FinishNavigationTemplate object either by using template-editing mode in design view or by defining the FinishNavigationTemplate object inline using `FinishNavigationTemplate` tags.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过在设计视图中使用模板编辑模式向 FinishNavigationTemplate 对象添加自定义的内容，也可以通过定义 FinishNavigationTemplate 对象内联使用`FinishNavigationTemplate`标记。

trans-unit.source: The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example).
trans-unit.target: 内容可以是很简单的纯文本或更复杂 （嵌入其他控件在模板中，例如）。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The FinishNavigationTemplate object that is contained in the FinishNavigationTemplate property must contain two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl> controls, one with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A> property set to "MoveComplete" and the other with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A> property set to "MovePrevious", to enable the navigation feature.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> FinishNavigationTemplate FinishNavigationTemplate 属性中包含的对象必须包含两个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl>控件，另一个使用其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A>属性设置为"MoveComplete"，另一种具有其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A>属性设置为"MovePrevious"，以启用导航功能。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl>

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于在控件上显示的标题区域的模板。

trans-unit.source: Use the HeaderTemplate property to specify the custom content that is displayed for the header area on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: HeaderTemplate 属性用于指定显示的标题区域的自定义内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the header area is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 通过创建指定的标题区域的呈现方式的模板中定义的内容。

trans-unit.source: The custom content for the template is contained within the HeaderTemplate object.
trans-unit.target: 模板的自定义内容包含在 HeaderTemplate 对象。

trans-unit.source: You can add custom content to the HeaderTemplate object either by using template-editing mode in design view or by defining the HeaderTemplate object inline using `HeaderTemplate` tags.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过在设计视图中使用模板编辑模式向 HeaderTemplate 对象添加自定义的内容，也可以通过定义 HeaderTemplate 对象内联使用`HeaderTemplate`标记。

trans-unit.source: The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example).
trans-unit.target: 内容可以是很简单的纯文本或更复杂 （嵌入其他控件在模板中，例如）。

trans-unit.source: To access a control that is defined in a template programmatically, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Controls%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问在模板中以编程方式定义控件，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Controls%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Controls%2A>

trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>对象来查找该控件中，如果控件具有<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>指定属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object that defines the settings for the buttons in the navigation area on the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取对<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref>上控件的导航区域中定义的按钮的设置的对象。

trans-unit.source: The NavigationButtonStyle property defines the appearance for the buttons in the navigation area on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: NavigationButtonStyle 属性上定义的导航区域中的按钮的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: The NavigationButtonStyle property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: NavigationButtonStyle 属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>它将返回的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>类 (例如， `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式设置属性的形式`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常用的设置包括自定义的背景色、 文本颜色和字体属性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the NavigationButtonStyle property are merged with the individual button styles.
trans-unit.target: 与单个按钮样式合并 NavigationButtonStyle 属性的样式设置。

trans-unit.source: Any setting that is applied in the individual button style properties overrides the corresponding setting in the NavigationButtonStyle property.
trans-unit.target: 在应用中的各个按钮样式属性的任何设置将替代 NavigationButtonStyle 属性中的相应设置。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the `FinishPreviousButtonStyle.ForeColor` property to `"red"` and the `NavigationButtonStyle.ForeColor` property to `"green"`, the color for the button will be red because the individual style settings of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishPreviousButtonStyle%2A> property override the settings of the NavigationButtonStyle property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你设置`FinishPreviousButtonStyle.ForeColor`属性`"red"`和`NavigationButtonStyle.ForeColor`属性`"green"`，该按钮的颜色将为红色，因为各个样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishPreviousButtonStyle%2A>属性重写 NavigationButtonStyle 属性的设置。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.FinishPreviousButtonStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following NavigationButtonStyle property styles are overridden by individual button style settings: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A>
trans-unit.target: 以下 NavigationButtonStyle 属性样式重写了各个按钮样式设置:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SideBarButtonStyle property defines the appearance of the buttons on the sidebar of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: SideBarButtonStyle 属性定义的侧栏上的按钮的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: The SideBarButtonStyle property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: SideBarButtonStyle 属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>它将返回的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>类 (例如， `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式设置属性的形式`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常用的设置包括自定义的背景色、 文本颜色和字体属性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the SideBarButtonStyle property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 与的样式设置合并 SideBarButtonStyle 属性的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: Any settings that are applied in the SideBarButtonStyle property override the corresponding settings in the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: SideBarButtonStyle 属性中应用任何设置替代的属性中的相应设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> style properties are overridden by SideBarButtonStyle settings: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> However, when you use templates to define the appearance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control sidebar, the SideBarButtonStyle property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>样式属性被 SideBarButtonStyle 设置覆盖:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A>-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A>但是，当你使用模板可以定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控件栏中，SideBarButtonStyle 属性不起作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The height property for SideBarStyle is ignored if the height is set to less than the height of the wizard.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果高度设置为小于该向导的高度，则忽略 SideBarStyle 的高度属性。

trans-unit.source: Values set for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationStyle%2A> height and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderStyle%2A> height add to the total height of the wizard.
trans-unit.target: 值设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationStyle%2A>高度和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderStyle%2A>高度将添加到向导的总高度。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the Wizard height is set to 500px and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationStyle%2A> height or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderStyle%2A> height is set to 50px or 10%, then the total wizard height is 550px.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果向导高度设置为 500px 和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationStyle%2A>高度或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderStyle%2A>高度设置为 50px 或 10%，则总向导高度为 550px。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.HeaderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template that is used to display the sidebar area on the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于在控件上显示的侧栏区域的模板。

trans-unit.source: Use the SideBarTemplate property to specify the custom content that is displayed for the sidebar area on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SideBarTemplate 属性指定的侧栏区域显示的自定义内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the sidebar area is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 通过创建指定的侧栏区域的呈现方式的模板中定义的内容。

trans-unit.source: The custom content for the template is contained within the SideBarTemplate object.
trans-unit.target: 模板的自定义内容包含在 SideBarTemplate 对象。

trans-unit.source: You can add custom content to the SideBarTemplate object either by using template-editing mode in design view or by defining the SideBarTemplate object inline using `SideBarTemplate` tags.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过在设计视图中使用模板编辑模式向 SideBarTemplate 对象添加自定义的内容，也可以通过定义 SideBarTemplate 对象内联使用`SideBarTemplate`标记。

trans-unit.source: The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example).
trans-unit.target: 内容可以是很简单的纯文本或更复杂 （嵌入其他控件在模板中，例如）。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The SideBarTemplate object must contain a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> control or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property is set to `"SideBarList"` to enable the sidebar navigation feature.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> SideBarTemplate 对象必须包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>控件或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制其<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>属性设置为`"SideBarList"`若要启用边栏导航功能。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: Also, the `"SideBarList"` on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control must contain an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl> control.
trans-unit.target: 此外，`"SideBarList"`上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控件必须包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>

trans-unit.source: To access a control that is defined in a template programmatically, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Controls%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问在模板中以编程方式定义控件，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Controls%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Controls%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> object to find the control, if the control has an <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property specified.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>对象来查找该控件中，如果控件具有<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>指定属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> that contains the template for displaying the sidebar area on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref> ，其中包含用于显示在侧栏区域模板<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that is used to render alternate text that notifies screen readers to skip the content in the sidebar area.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，用于呈现通知屏幕阅读器跳过侧栏区域中的内容的替换文字。

trans-unit.source: Use the SkipLinkText property to specify the alternate text for a hidden image that is read by screen readers to provide the ability to skip the content for a sidebar area.
trans-unit.target: SkipLinkText 属性用于指定由屏幕阅读器，以提供跳过侧栏区域的内容的功能读取的隐藏图像的替换文字。

trans-unit.source: The text that you specify provides assistive technology devices with a description of the hidden image that can be used to make the control more accessible.
trans-unit.target: 你指定的文本提供了可用于使控件更易于访问的隐藏图像的说明的辅助技术设备。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.DisplaySideBar%2A> property is set to `false`, the SkipLinkText property does not create a hidden image with alternate text.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.DisplaySideBar%2A>属性设置为`false`，SkipLinkText 属性不会创建的隐藏的图像的替换文字。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.DisplaySideBar%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A string that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> renders as alternate text with an invisible image, as a hint to screen readers.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串， <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"> </xref>将呈现为不可见的图像的替换文字，作为对屏幕阅读器的提示。

trans-unit.source: The default is `"Skip Navigation Links"`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是`"Skip Navigation Links"`。

trans-unit.source: The default text for the control is localized based on the current locale for the server.
trans-unit.target: 控件的默认文本进行了本地化基于服务器的当前区域设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template that is used to display the navigation area on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref> step of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于在上显示的导航区域的模板<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref>的步骤<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.target: 使用 StartNavigationTemplate 属性指定的导航区域显示的自定义内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType>的步骤<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType>

trans-unit.source: Define the content by creating a template that specifies how the navigation area is rendered on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType> step.
trans-unit.target: 通过创建指定的导航区域上的呈现方式的模板定义的内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType>步骤。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType>

trans-unit.source: The custom content for the template is contained within the StartNavigationTemplate object.
trans-unit.target: 模板的自定义内容包含在 StartNavigationTemplate 对象。

trans-unit.source: You can add custom content to the StartNavigationTemplate object either by using template-editing mode in design view or by defining the StartNavigationTemplate object inline using `StartNavigationTemplate` tags.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过在设计视图中使用模板编辑模式向 StartNavigationTemplate 对象添加自定义的内容，也可以通过定义 StartNavigationTemplate 对象内联使用`StartNavigationTemplate`标记。

trans-unit.source: The content can be as simple as plain text or more complex (embedding other controls in the template, for example).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The StartNavigationTemplate object that is contained in the StartNavigationTemplate property must contain an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl> control with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A> property set to `"MoveNext"` to enable the navigation feature.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> StartNavigationTemplate 属性中包含的 StartNavigationTemplate 对象必须包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl>控件替换为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A>属性设置为`"MoveNext"`若要启用导航功能。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl>

trans-unit.target: 若要访问在模板中以编程方式定义控件，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Controls%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Controls%2A>

trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.target: 获取对<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref>定义的设置的对象**下一步**按钮上<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType"></xref>步骤。

trans-unit.source: The StartNextButtonStyle property defines the appearance for the **Next** button on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType> step of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: StartNextButtonStyle 属性定义的外观**下一步**按钮上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType>的步骤<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepType>

trans-unit.source: The StartNextButtonStyle property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: StartNextButtonStyle 属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>它将返回的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` represents a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> class (for example, `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以在窗体中以声明方式设置这些属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`表示的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>类 (例如， `CancelButtonStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: You can set a property programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 你可以以编程方式设置属性的形式`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `CancelButtonStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings include custom background color, text color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: 常用的设置包括自定义的背景色、 文本颜色和字体属性。

trans-unit.source: The style settings for the StartNextButtonStyle property are merged with the style settings for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A> property.

trans-unit.source: Any setting that is applied in the StartNextButtonStyle property overrides the corresponding setting in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: StartNextButtonStyle 属性中应用任何设置将重写中的相应设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NavigationButtonStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The StepNavigationTemplate object that is contained in the StepNavigationTemplate property must contain two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl> controls, one with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A> property set to `"MoveNext"` and one with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A> property set to `"MovePrevious"`, to enable the navigation feature.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> StepNavigationTemplate StepNavigationTemplate 属性中包含的对象必须包含两个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl>控件，另一个使用其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A>属性设置为`"MoveNext"`另一个使用其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A>属性设置为`"MovePrevious"`，若要启用导航功能。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.IButtonControl>

trans-unit.source: To access a control that is defined in a template programmatically, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Controls%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问在模板中以编程方式定义控件，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Controls%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Controls%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> object to find the control, if the control has an <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property specified.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>对象来查找该控件中，如果控件具有<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>指定属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>

trans-unit.target: 与的样式设置合并 StepStyle 属性的样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any setting that is applied in the StepStyle property overrides the corresponding setting in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: StepStyle 属性中应用任何设置将重写中的相应设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following StepStyle properties can be set to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.CssClass%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> When you use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep> template to define the appearance for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep> objects, the StepStyle property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 可以设置以下 StepStyle 属性重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控件:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.CssClass%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A>-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A>当你使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep>模板来定义的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep>对象，StepStyle 属性不起作用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Width%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.CssClass%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BorderColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: The WizardSteps property returns a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> objects that make up the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: WizardSteps 属性返回的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>组成对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: You can use the WizardSteps collection to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> objects that are contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 WizardSteps 集合可访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>中包含的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>以编程方式控制。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Clear%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Insert%2A> methods to manipulate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> objects in the collection programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Add%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Remove%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Clear%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Insert%2A>操作的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase>以编程方式对象集合中。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you are using Microsoft Visual Studio 2005, note that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> is persisted in Source view.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 如果使用 Microsoft Visual Studio 2005，请注意，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>保留在源视图。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you change the WizardSteps property in Design view by clicking the sidebar buttons, and you then run the page, the first step of the `Wizard` control might not be shown because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A> might be pointing to a different step.
trans-unit.target: 如果您通过单击侧栏按钮，更改设计视图中的 WizardSteps 属性，然后运行页的第一步`Wizard`控件可能不会显示，因为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>可能指向了另一个步骤。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.ActiveStepIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control contains multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> collections, the collections will be merged.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>控件包含多个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection>集合，集合将合并。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStepCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。
